snippet: Fifteen minutes before his leg injury, Chelsea captain John Terry scored his 50th goal with the team, which went on to a 1-1 draw with visiting Liverpool in the Premier League.
abstract: Chelsea earns 1-1 draw with Liverpool in Premiere League soccer; Chelsea captain John Terry scores his 50th goal before being carried off pitch with leg injury; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fifteen minutes before his leg injury, Chelsea captain John Terry scored his 50th goal with the team, which went on to a 1-1 draw with visiting Liverpool in the Premier League.

headline.main: Chelsea Captain Terry Hurt in Return
